item.title: Crystal add a quote by James Joyce
item.description: "Think you're escaping and run into yourself. Longest way round is the shortest way home." -- James Joyce

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "No one who can read, ever looks at a book, even unopened on a shelf, like one who cannot." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Crystal add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Pouring out liquor is like burning books." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Crystal add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Michael Crichton
item.description: "Do you know what we call opinion in the absence of evidence? We call it prejudice." -- Michael Crichton

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "I teach Sunday school, motherf*****." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Crystal add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "If you care about something you have to protect it – If you’re lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it." -- John Irving

item.title: Crystal add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "The only way you get Americans to notice anything is to tax them or draft them or kill them." -- John Irving

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Crystal add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Crystal add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Lord, what fools these mortals be!" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do one thing every day that scares you." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "Face it girls. I'm older and I have more insurance." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I think there's just one kind of folks. Folks." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor
